動物用藥品名稱: 馬爾他雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病及傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS:10^9EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION;INACTIVATED INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS STRAIN MASSACHUSETTS M41:10^7.5EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION; SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 0.037ML;LIGHT MINNERAL OIL 0.337ML; THIMEROSAL 50UG.
